name: sap-connector
description: SAP ERP integration with RFC, BAPI, OData services, and IDoc support
author: Hermetic Labs

card.title: SAP Connector
card.description: ERP integration with RFC, BAPI, OData, and IDoc

summary.overview: SAP ERP integration supporting RFC function calls, BAPI execution, OData service integration, IDoc processing, and material/vendor management.
summary.exampleUseCase: Execute BAPIs for material master updates, process inbound IDocs from suppliers, query OData services for real-time inventory, and manage vendor records via RFC.
summary.whatMakesThisDifferent: Native SAP protocol support - no middleware required. IDoc processing for EDI integration. Works with S/4HANA and legacy ECC systems.
